name: Rayman 2: The Great Escape
description:
Installs Retail version from disc and applies widescreen fix
Also nGlide is used to fix graphic problems (like blurry textures)
notes:
The installer can't download the widescreen fix automatically, so you need to download it (link is provided)

By default the resolution used is 1920x1080
You can change that by editing the ubi.ini file and running nglide_config with wineprefix and change it there as well

files.widescreenzip:
N/A:Select the widescreen fix zip file
https://raymanpc.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=21665

task.name: wineexec
task.description: Installing Rayman 2, don't change default settings.

content:
files:
- glide:
    filename: nglide.exe
    referer: www.zeus-software.com
    url: http://www.zeus-software.com/downloads/nglide/d-1.html
- widescreenzip: 'N/A:Select the widescreen fix zip file

    https://raymanpc.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=21665'
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/UbiSoft/Rayman2/Rayman2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing nGlide
    executable: glide
    name: wineexec
- task:
    key: Aspect
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Zeus Software\nGlide2
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: '0'
- task:
    key: Backend
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Zeus Software\nGlide2
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: '2'
- task:
    key: Gamma
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Zeus Software\nGlide2
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: '2'
- task:
    key: Refresh
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Zeus Software\nGlide2
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: '2'
- task:
    key: Resolution
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Zeus Software\nGlide2
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: '21'
- task:
    key: Splash
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Zeus Software\nGlide2
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: '0'
- task:
    key: Vsync
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Zeus Software\nGlide2
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: '1'
- insert-disc:
    requires: Rayman2.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Rayman 2, don't change default settings.
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/UbiSoft/Rayman2/Data/
    src: $DISC/Data/Vignette.cnt
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/UbiSoft/Rayman2/Data/World/Levels/
    src: $DISC/Data/World/Levels/LEVELS0.dat
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/widescreen
    file: widescreenzip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/UbiSoft/Rayman2
    src: $GAMEDIR/widescreen/
- write_config:
    data:
      Rayman2:
        GLI_Device: ''
        GLI_Dll: Glide2
        GLI_DllFile: GliVd1
        GLI_Driver: ''
        GLI_Mode: 1 - 1920 x 1080 x 32
        Language: English
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/UbiSoft/Rayman2/ubi.ini
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1024x768
